'''Fukuuchi Udon''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Udon Noodles]] with [[Yae Miko]]. The [[Recipes|recipe]] for Udon Noodles is obtainable from [[Shimura's]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Fukuuchi Udon revives a character and restores '''15'''% of Max HP, then restores an additional '''550''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this food cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* This dish is based on kitsune udon (lit. "fox udon"), or a {{w|udon}} noodle dish topped with fried tofu.
* "Fuku wa uchi!" ("Fortune in!") is a ceremonial shouting during {{w|Setsubun}}, a traditional Japanese festival held around February 3.
** "Fukuuchi" in the English name probably comes from the Japanese reading of its Chinese rendering (福内).
* The following birthday mails included Fukuuchi Udon:
** [[Birthday/Yae Miko#What a Coincidence...|Yae Miko's 2022 Birthday Mail]] (1 Fukuuchi Udon)
